General.Name: Verde Resources Inc
General.Description: Verde Resources, Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the gold mining business in Malaysia. The company holds interests in the Merapoh gold mine that covers an area of 400 acres located in northern Pahang, Malaysia. It is also involved in the production and distribution of renewable commodities. Verde Resources, Inc. was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.
General.Address: 2 Cityplace Drive, Saint Louis, MO, United States, 63141
